MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the DG8 postcode area of Newton Stewart. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 03.03am. Our team has managed to restore power to a number of properties in the area and are arranging for generators to restore supply for the rest of our customers without power. We now expect all power to be back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 08.00am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 05:55am on Monday, 26 April 2021
